name: Marble Jump!
description:
A little physics-based puzzle plattformer i build for the fun-button jam. The point of the jam was to make a game were the only way to interact with it is a button with "fun" written on it. Click the button to switch between a metal and a bouncy ball. Hold the button for one second to restart the level.

There are 9 levels at the moment. I hope you enjoy, and please leave your feedback in the comments (This is my first game, so please be gentle). I hope the mac and linux versions work,because i couldn't test them.
